/-- Let Ï†colon Pto Q be a smooth map of manifolds with dim P < dim Q. Show that the image Ï†(P) is nowhere dense in Q. -/
theorem isNowhereDense_image_of_dim_lt {P Q : Type*} [MetricSpace P] [MetricSpace Q]
    [SmoothManifoldWithCorners ð“˜(ð•œ, P) P] [SmoothManifoldWithCorners ð“˜(ð•œ, Q) Q]
    {Ï† : P â†’ Q} (hÏ† : SmoothManifoldMap ð“˜(ð•œ, P) ð“˜(ð•œ, Q) Ï†) (hPQ : dim P < dim Q) :
    IsNowhereDense (range Ï†) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set

/-- Let Ï† : M â†’ M' be a smooth map of manifolds with dim M < dim M'. Then the image is nowhere dense. -/
theorem isNowhereDense_range_of_cont_mdiff_dim_lt {ð•œ : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField ð•œ]
  {E E' : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ð•œ E] [FiniteDimensional ð•œ E]
  [NormedAddCommGroup E'] [NormedSpace ð•œ E'] [FiniteDimensional ð•œ E']
  {H : Type*} [TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ð•œ E H)
  {H' : Type*} [TopologicalSpace H'] (I' : ModelWithCorners ð•œ E' H')
  {M : Type*} [TopologicalSpace M] [ChartedSpace H M]
  {M' : Type*} [TopologicalSpace M'] [ChartedSpace H' M']
  {f : M â†’ M'} (hf : ContMDiff I âŠ¤ I' f)
  (h_dim : Module.rank ð•œ E < Module.rank ð•œ E') :
  IsNowhereDense (range f) := by sorry

import Mathlib

universe u v w
open Set

/-- Let Ï† : M â†’ M' be a smooth map of manifolds with dim M < dim M'. Then the image is nowhere dense. -/
theorem isNowhereDense_range_of_cont_mdiff_dim_lt {ð•œ : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField ð•œ]
  {E E' : Type u} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ð•œ E] [FiniteDimensional ð•œ E]
  [NormedAddCommGroup E'] [NormedSpace ð•œ E'] [FiniteDimensional ð•œ E']
  {H : Type v} [TopologicalSpace H] (I : ModelWithCorners ð•œ E H)
  {H' : Type w} [TopologicalSpace H'] (I' : ModelWithCorners ð•œ E' H')
  {M : Type*} [TopologicalSpace M] [ChartedSpace H M]
  {M' : Type*} [TopologicalSpace M'] [ChartedSpace H' M']
  {f : M â†’ M'} (hf : ContMDiff I I' (âŠ¤ : WithTop â„•âˆž) f)
  (h_dim : Module.rank ð•œ E < Module.rank ð•œ E') :
  IsNowhereDense (range f) := by sorry
